message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can always adjust if you're not happy.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. We can always adjust in the next round if you're not happy.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. 57.5/42.5 is a good middle ground. It's a compromise from both our previous proposals.  Let's close this deal and avoid further inflation.
